mapper.select: SELECT T01.CONTENT AS content, T01.TIME AS date, T01.WORK_HOURS AS workHours, T02.`NAME` AS projectName FROM `tbl_daily` T01, `tbl_project` T02 WHERE T01.PROJECT_ID = T02.ID AND SUBSTR( T01.TIME, 1, 7 ) = #{month, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T01.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T01.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND T02.IS_DELETED = 'N'
